Key Match Events: Rain led to the abandonment of defending champions England's T20 World Cup opener against Scotland at the Kensington Oval in Barbados on June 4, 2024.
Scotland made 90-0 in an interrupted innings reduced to 10 overs, with George Munsey 41 not out and Michael Jones 45 not out.
Before England could begin their pursuit of a revised target of 109 in 10 overs, a fresh downpour led the umpires to call off the game.
Both sides received a point apiece.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play during the ICC Men's T20 CWC group B match between England and Scotland at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados, on June 4, 2024.
